sentences.en: a mirror angled to reflect light from a window
sentences.cn: 为反射窗外的光线而斜放的一面镜子

sentences.en: A right angle is an angle of 90 degrees.
sentences.cn: 直角为90度.

sentences.en: an armchair was drawn up &B{at an angle to} his desk.
sentences.cn: 扶手椅被拉了过来斜对着他的桌子。

sentences.en: An iron bar stuck out at an angle.
sentences.cn: 一根铁棍斜伸出来。

sentences.en: David's play was amusing and its pacifist angle had a great appeal.
sentences.cn: 戴维的剧本很有趣,剧中的和平主义倾向性有很大的吸引力.

sentences.en: Hold the knife at an angle.
sentences.cn: 斜握住刀。

sentences.en: Oxford Road joins the High Street at an angle of ninety degrees.
sentences.cn: 牛津路与该大街垂直相交.

sentences.en: she wore her beret at an angle.
sentences.cn: 她歪戴贝雷帽。

sentences.en: the angle of deflection
sentences.cn: 偏斜度

sentences.en: The body was twisted, its legs at an awkward angle.
sentences.cn: 身体扭曲变形，双腿弯成别扭的角度。

sentences.en: The helicopter turned at an awful angle before righting itself.
sentences.cn: 直升机在恢复平稳之前倾斜得很厉害。

sentences.en: The high jumper took off at a bad angle.
sentences.cn: 跳高运动员的起跳角度不好.

sentences.en: The matter invites our consideration of every possible angle.
sentences.cn: 这件事需要我们通盘考虑.

sentences.en: The old house leans to the right at a dangerous angle.
sentences.cn: 那所老宅向右斜得很危险.

sentences.en: The tower of Pisa leans at an angle .
sentences.cn: 比萨斜塔塔身倾斜。

sentences.en: The tree was leaning at a low angle from the ground.
sentences.cn: 那棵树倾斜得非常厉害。

sentences.en: The wall's at a slight angle.
sentences.cn: 这面墙有点歪。

sentences.en: they come shooting at us from all angles.
sentences.cn: 他们从不同角度向我们射击。

sentences.en: Tourists were scrambling over the rocks looking for the perfect camera angle.
sentences.cn: 游客们在正爬上岩石寻找最佳的拍摄角度。

sentences.en: We’re approaching the issue from many different angles
sentences.cn: 我们从许多不同的角度来考虑这个问题。

sentences.en: You didn’t measure the angle accurately.
sentences.cn: 你没有量准角度。

words.tran_cn: 钓鱼；琵琶鱼；钓鱼者；用不正当手段谋取好处的人
使成角度（angle的过去式和过去分词）
调整…的角度；斜向地行进（angle的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 以某一角度，成一定角度
从各个方向；从各个角度
旋转角；旋转角度；回转角度

trans.tran_en: the space between two straight lines or surfaces that join each other, measured in degrees

trans.tran_cn: 斜移，斜置，从某角度报道（提供信息）
